I'll try to keep this short and sweet, unlike the service at this bar.  The bar is decorated nicely with a lot of fake antique Americana.  It's a cool looking place for a sports buff.  Even though my traveling friend and I are from California and are used to being patient at a busy establishment, we were swiftly schooled with slow inattentive service while in France.  We get it.  However, this place takes the cake for the worst service/employees we've ever had the displeasure to encounter.  The tall douchey guy with a shaved head was pretty much a prick the whole time except while he was trying to hook up with a sleazy local girl.  We tried ordering our second round of beers a few times with no luck despite less than 10 other people in the entire establishment.  He was busy either high-fiving his co-worker or on the phone with, whom must have been his BFF.  After about 20 minutes, we decided to settle our check.  With a rude attitude from the "bartender" we were on our way.  If you happen to be in the neighborhood, do yourself a favor and keep walking or tell the cab driver to take you somewhere else.  I truly feel bad for the owner of this bar.  We are going to be in Barcelona for 3 more nights and, despite being right around the corner from this place, wouldn't go back even if the drinks were free!   There are plenty of other good ones around this city.  If I could give negative stars for the service, I'd have left a worse review.  Good luck!
